title: Fallen Angel Spring Mode
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>Hmm hmm…. I see, I see~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Is that good?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Yeah! Thank you, Yoshiko-chan. I’m starting to get a better grasp of the dark image for the next outfit’s theme<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Fuh…. It’s dangerous to peer too deeply into the abyss of Fallen Angels okay? So if you’re not prepared, Kotori…. You understand. Also it’s Yohane<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Worrying about me like that, what a kind fallen angel♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eeh!? I-, I take back what I just said! Then, again…. The moment that you took interest in fallen angels, you have already entered the abyss…. You’ve become enchanted by Yohane’s magical power huh….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Yeah, I might have. Because Yoshiko-chan, your outfits are always cute. It’s amazing that you always wear something that suits you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>L-, like I said, aargh~~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>However, if I tweak this part here, like this, and take that out…. This, that, and that! Ehehe, how is it? Fallen Angel, spring version♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>There’s no such thing as spring for fallen angels! Also it’s Yohane!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
